body.description: I am into web developing, and also into different things. Here, you can check out on what i am working on.

about.name: Tair Dulatuly
about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Aspiring Developer
about.skills: Skilled in python (flask, selenium, beautiful soup, sqlalchemy), javascipt (react, material-ui), solidity.
about.suggestion: Check out my services on these websites:
about.connect: I am always up for a chat! feel free to reach out!

projects.heading: My projects.
projects.portfolio-desc: Portfolio website, showcasing projects of Tair Dulatuly built on react by using material-ui as styling.
projects.ecolifestyle-desc: Full-fledged blogging platform on Flask and SQLalchemy with support for registration, authorization, comments, an events calendar and a feedback form.
projects.activitygenerator-desc: Flask web application that uses the Bored API to suggest activities to users who are feeling bored.
projects.paletegenerator-desc: Simple web application built with Flask that allows users to upload an image and extract its dominant color palette using the ColorThief library.
projects.nbascraper-desc: Python script that scrapes NBA player stats from the official NBA website using Selenium and saves the data to a CSV file.
projects.breakout-desc: Simple Brick Breaker game built using Python's turtle module. In this game, the player controls a paddle to hit a ball towards a set of bricks at the top of the screen, with the goal of breaking all the bricks to advance to the next level.
projects.spaceinvaders-desc: Simple implementation of the popular game Space Invaders using Python's turtle graphics library.
projects.disappearingwriting-desc: Simple tkinter GUI application that counts the number of words you write in a text field within a time limit of 5 seconds. If you don't write anything in the text field within the time limit, the text will disappear.
projects.imagewatermarker-desc: Simple GUI application built with Python's tkinter and PIL libraries that allows a user to choose an image and watermark it.
projects.typingspeed-desc: Simple Python application that allows users to measure their typing speed by tracking the number of characters they type per minute.
